title: Riot Player support not responding
body: I submitted a ticket on the player support page, but riot hasn't answered for a day. Why is this so?

replies.body: It might be a bit backed up depending on who you're reaching out to.  Toss me your ticket number, I'd be happy to check on the status for you!
give it some time. if it isn't answered for the rest of today go ahead and submit another ticket.
